patch 8.2.1719: Vim9: no error if comma is missing in between arguments

Solution:   Give an error message.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b816dae16dbeec91ccb6fd1c0289b86b4ad5d7b3|patch 8.2.1718: Vim9: :def function disallows "firstline" for no good…>
patch 8.2.1718: Vim9: :def function disallows "firstline" for no good reason

Problem:    Vim9: :def function disallows "firstline" and "lastline" argument
            names for no good reason.
Solution:   Don't check the arguments for a :def function. (closes #6986)

patch 8.2.1717
Problem:    MS-Windows installer doesn't have Russian translations.
Solution:   Add Russian translations. (closes #6985)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b5cfff0b34d1be87f7d0458e4b9addd71c5d5b1d|patch 8.2.1716: options window has duplicate translations>
patch 8.2.1716: options window has duplicate translations

Problem:    Options window has duplicate translations.
Solution:   Make one entry for "global or local to buffer".  Fix wrong text.
            (closes #6983)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1716: options window has duplicate translations · vim/vim@b5cfff0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1716: options window has duplicate translations · vim/vim@b5cfff0
attachments.text: Problem: Options window has duplicate translations. Solution: Make one entry for "global or local to buffer". Fix wrong text. (closes #6983)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/26cd3063b2e2084cfd17989e7584c64f278aaaef|patch 8.2.1715: Motif GUI: commented out code missed {}>
patch 8.2.1715: Motif GUI: commented out code missed {}

Problem:    Motif GUI: commented out code missed {}.
Solution:   Add {} and reenable the code. (similar to #6989)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1715: Motif GUI: commented out code missed {} · vim/vim@26cd306
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1715: Motif GUI: commented out code missed {} · vim/vim@26cd306
attachments.text: Problem: Motif GUI: commented out code missed {}. Solution: Add {} and reenable the code. (similar to #6989)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8902b31f1b31c117915defc23ac45cdc1f5c671b|patch 8.2.1714: text properties corrupted with substitute command>
patch 8.2.1714: text properties corrupted with substitute command

Problem:    Text properties corrupted with substitute command. (Filipe
            Brandenburger)
Solution:   Get the changed line again after using u_savesub(). (closes #6984)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1714: text properties corrupted with substitute command · vim/vim@8902b31
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1714: text properties corrupted with substitute command · vim/vim@8902b31
attachments.text: Problem: Text properties corrupted with substitute command. (Filipe Brandenburger) Solution: Get the changed line again after using u_savesub(). (closes #6984)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7795bfea6d30c85f2c05d986a0cfe4019df4d74d|patch 8.2.1713: Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors>
patch 8.2.1713: Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors

Problem:    Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors. (Andrzej Bylicki)
Solution:   Add {} to make "n" incremented correctly. (closes #6989,
            closes #5948)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1713: Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors · vim/vim@7795bfe
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1713: Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors · vim/vim@7795bfe
attachments.text: Problem: Motif GUI: crash when setting menu colors. (Andrzej Bylicki) Solution: Add {} to make "n" incremented correctly. (closes #6989, closes #5948)
